name: Car Trader Simulator
description:
The first and only true Car Trader Sim is here!
Find out what it’s like to be a real life Car Trader – find the best deals on auctions, buy at a good price by bidding to win, search for customers and use your wit and negotiating skills to sell your cars with a profit – keeping your reputation intact.


Thanks to a sprawling modding community, our in-game car market is huuuuge – there are 10’s of thousands of cars available. It is up to you decide what is a best deal car and place it in your sights.


You’re not the only one who has their eye on this great deal of a car. You have to take part in auctions and out bid the competition. But be careful not to over bid and loose money.


Will you buy a broken car, NOT fix it and lie your way to a good sale, risking your reputation? Or will you fix it good and make a smaller profit? You are the Car Trader so you get to decide.


Create and place online ads for your cars. In the ads, you can tell the truth or manipulate facts to generate more interested customers. Always remember about your reputation!


Once your car hungry customer calls, you can tell them whatever you want. Some customers ale smarter than others and will see through your lies. Some won’t. You decide what you tell to who. Your profit and reputation are on the line!
